com.paypal.merchant.sdk

Interface TransactionListener


  • public interface TransactionListener
    TransactionListener defines callbacks that will be invoked by the SDK to communicate important events related to the payment process.

    Once you've implemented this interface you must register it with the PaymentManager like this:

    TransactionListener methods are only called on the main UI thread. You should not block when handling this callbacks.

    PayPalHereSDK.getPaymentManager().registerListener(myTransactionListener);

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  TransactionListener.PaymentEvent
      PaymentEvent

      Currently only provides the event type.
      static class  TransactionListener.PaymentEventType
      The Payment Events we'll send to the app.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPaymentEvent(TransactionListener.PaymentEvent e)
      onPaymentEvent

      This method will be called whenever the payment manager needs to communicate a payment related event to the application.

    • Method Detail

      • onPaymentEvent

        void onPaymentEvent(TransactionListener.PaymentEvent e)
        onPaymentEvent

        This method will be called whenever the payment manager needs to communicate a payment related event to the application.

        Parameters:
        e - a PaymentEvent object the contains information about the event.
